entry.title: Red Raspberry Leaf
entry.content:
Hallonblad âŒ Rubus Idaeus

ğŸ“ Europe and Norther Asia

âœ… Local to Nordic ecologies

âš—ï¸ Menstrual cramps. Aid in the last stage of labor. Contains fragarine, a plant compound that helps tone and tighten muscles in the pelvic area, which may reduce the menstrual cramping caused by the spasms of these muscles.

ğŸµ Used as a tea
